original_text: But no! You have lit your own fires. You have burned branches to give yourselves light. So now you must walk in the light of the fires that you have lit. And this is what I will do for you: I will punish you with great pain! But no! You have lit your own fires.
korean_text: 보라 불을 피우고 횃불을 둘러 띤 자여 너희가 다 너희의 불꽃 가운데로 걸어가며 너희가 피운 횃불 가운데로 걸어갈지어다 너희가 내 손에서 얻을 것이 이것이라 너희가 고통이 있는 곳에 누우리라

sentences.original_text: You have lit your own fires.
in the light of the fires
And this is what I will do for you:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 당신을 위해 할 일은 이것입니다:

sentences.original_text: I will punish you with great pain!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 큰 고통으로 당신을 벌할 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: You have lit your own fires.
